trends: There have been 5 other sightings in Hamilton
There were no other sightings in Hamilton on or around July 17th 2010
divs: Sighting Detailsaround 10pm, i was at a lake bailee recreational park in Overpeck,oh, when a nuuber of us seen four lights in the northeast sky, They began to pull slightly and slowly away from each other -- two moving up and out and the other two moving down. Then, one after another, they blinked out disappearing, only to blink back and reappear again one at a time in order. I later learned that a hot air balloon festival is occurring this weekend, starting the day of my sighting, in Middletown, OH, approximately 10 miles away. I don't believe hot air balloons are what I witnessed due to the fact that event was already over. That said, I'm still not sure what I witnessed, and for all I know, despite having doubts, it very well could have been lights from the balloon festival. i also see im not the only one who witnessed this event in the sky.
Summary: Four amber lights in the sky.
